page.name: Chaos Weaver Web Site
page.description: The town library says that the Chaos Weavers set up sites that all connect to their main site like a web. Head into the Chaos Weaver's web site and find out what you can.

properties.name: Chaos Weaver Web Site
properties.description: The town library says that the Chaos Weavers set up sites that all connect to their main site like a web. Head into the Chaos Weaver's web site and find out what you can.
properties.complete: You ran part of the perimeter of the Chaos Weaver's main web site which is a underground city of some sort. You have also brought back some artifacts which you can use at the Defender's Shop to upgrade your Spider Slayer weapon.
